summary.span: 为所有工作流消息筛选器提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for all workflow message filters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流设计器提供一个 `Strategy` 设计模式来创建可替换的消息筛选器对象以处理事件。The workflow designer provides a `Strategy` design pattern to create replaceable message filter objects to handle events. 从 类中进行派生以创建可响应工作流设计器事件（如拖动操作、布局和绘画操作以及其他设计器事件）的消息筛选器。Derive from the class to create message filters that can respond to workflow designer events, such as drag operations, layout and paint operations, and other designer events. 若要向消息筛选器链添加自定义消息筛选器，请对 调用 ，或重写自定义根活动的 虚拟属性并向从基类中返回的集合添加自定义消息筛选器。To add a custom message filter to the message filters chain, call the on the or override the virtual property on the custom root activity and add the custom message filter to the collection returned from the base class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示一个从 中派生的自定义设计器消息筛选器。The following code example shows a custom designer message filter that derives from . 名为 `CustomMessageFilter` 的类将重写它的许多基类方法，其中包括 、、、、、、、、 和 。The class, named `CustomMessageFilter`, overrides a number of its base class methods including , , , , , , , , , and . 此代码示例摘自 DesignerShell.cs 文件中的基本设计器宿主 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [基本设计器宿主](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[wf_Samples#237](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets24.cs#237)] [!code-vb[wf_Samples#237](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets24.vb#237)]

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 将释放设置为 `Dispose`，调用 `false`。 invokes `Dispose` with disposing set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object. > [!NOTE] > `Dispose` 可以由其他对象多次调用。`Dispose` can be called multiple times by other objects. 重写 `Dispose(Boolean)` 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 `Dispose` 时已释放的对象。When overriding `Dispose(Boolean)`, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to `Dispose`. 有关如何实现的详细信息 `Dispose(Boolean)` ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information about how to implement `Dispose(Boolean)`, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). 有关详细信息，请参阅 `Dispose` 和 `Finalize` ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see `Dispose` and `Finalize`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当双击鼠标时发生 。 occurs when you double-click the mouse. 双击操作由操作系统的鼠标设置确定。The double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the operating system. 可以设置两次单击鼠标按钮之间的时间以便将这两次单击认为是双击而不是两次单击。You can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that is considered a double-click rather than two clicks. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法来返回 `false`，以便设计器结构中的其他组件可以处理此方法。The following code example shows how to override the method to return `false` so that other components in the designer architecture can process the method. 此代码示例摘自 DesignerShell.cs 文件中的基本设计器宿主 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [基本设计器宿主](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90)). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在执行拖动操作期间发生 `OnQueryContinueDrag`。`OnQueryContinueDrag` occurs during a drag operation. `OnQueryContinueDrag` 事件允许拖动源确定是否应取消拖放操作。The `OnQueryContinueDrag` event allows the drag source to determine whether the drag operation should be canceled. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 方法，以便它始终返回 `true`。The following code example shows how to override the method so that it always returns `true`. 此代码示例摘自 DesignerShell.cs 文件中的基本设计器宿主 SDK 示例。This code example is part of the Basic Designer Hosting SDK Sample from the DesignerShell.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [基本设计器宿主](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Basic Designer Hosting](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741708(v=vs.90)).
